title: Fully Furnished Optional, Premium Finishings (w/ heated garage space)
posting_body: 6 month or longer lease available beginning April 15th, 2022.

This two bedroom (both queen beds), 1.5 bathroom condo in Fulton River District is optionally fully furnished (if removed, adjust rent to $3,200/month) yielding probably one of the easiest moves you'll ever make.

Whether used as a condo for business travel between Chicago and elsewhere, newly relocating persons or a new family with infant or incoming addition, this is the place for you in the well-known booming Fulton Market District, steps from Restaurant Row and the most sought after neighborhood in the City of Chicago for the past several years and many more to come.
The master bathroom includes marble flooring and matching countertop, his/her separate sinks, and Jacuzzi tub and shower.
The kitchen has premium furnishings including granite countertops, travertine tile flooring, cherry cabinets, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and disposal.
The kitchen overlooks the living room w/ gas fireplace.
There is a washer and dryer in the unit as well.

The premium entertainment system in the living room includes a 55" Samsung LED wall mounted and adjustable television, Apple TV, Amazon Prime, Bose in-wall speakers, Klipsch subwoofer and Sony Entertainment System.
The unit has southern exposure so plenty of light emitted from outside throughout the day.
In addition, I will be leaving my gas (Weber Genesis) barbecue on the balcony for your use as well during your time of being a tenant.
Location:  The unit is located near the Fulton and Des Plaines intersection.

There is a Jewel a half block away, and all the great restaurants on Randolph Streets Restaurant Row are located a block away to include the massive recent development just across the highway at the Fulton River District gate.
This location can't be beat, steps to the Clinton/Lake Green Line and the Grand/Milwaukee Blue Line.
In addition, the location is about an 8 minute walk to the Loop and CTA bus lines are nearby.
Utilities and Services:  Wireless Internet (up to 100Mbps), Satellite HD service included.
Additional premiums in satellite television service available.
Electricity is approximately $50-$75/month on average.
There is also a dry cleaner located on the premises at the street level.
For those with children, there is also a daycare center on the first floor.

If there are furniture or electronics I have here that you don't want to use rather using your own be it some or all, I will remove it taking it with me to another condo I'll be living at, and the price will be adjusted.
Reply to this post if you have questions or want to schedule a showing and I will respond in kind directly.
October 1st available for a six month or annual lease.

Tenants having found this to be ideal include husband/wife; kid, flexible roommates (the shower is off of the master bedroom) and business persons who frequently travel to Chicago simply looking for more space and full amenities that a hotel can't provide them for the monthly cost.
